'''''Altar of Toxiuhmolpilia''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to climb to the highest point of the [[Great Volcano of Tollan]].

==Trivia==
* The {{w|New Fire ceremony}} ({{w|Nahuatl}}: ''Toxiuhmolpilia'') was an {{w|Aztecs|Aztec}} ceremony performed once every 52 years—a full cycle of the Aztec “calendar round”—in order to stave off the end of the world. During this time the Aztecs believed the sun might not come back. The Aztecs wanted to symbolically and literally purify and "renew" their lives for the beginning of the new 52 year cycle.
